section.name: Two minutes to get it running.
section.p: Download. Unpack. Run. Demonstrated. Watch the following movie to see how easy it is to download and run the AQ Master Server.
To download the server, please proceed to the download page.
To put data in, fetch data from it and general use, please proceed to the interface documentation.
Keep in mind, this is built using the ActiveQuant AQ2o framework. More information about AQ2O can be found on its subsite.
Contact Ulrich/Sales for more information: ustaudinger@activequant.com or proceed to http://www.activequant.com. Don't hesitate to let us know if something's broken.
